title: A major disaster is declared in New Mexico, unlocking federal aid as wildfires threaten thousands of homes - CNN
content:
1. A major disaster is declared in New Mexico, unlocking federal aid as wildfires threaten thousands of homes  CNN
  2. Biden approves disaster funds as New Mexico firefighters battle fires | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
  3. With Wildfires Burning in New Mexico, Biden Approves Disaster Declaration  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Biden declares disaster for wildfire-hit New Mexico  Reuters
  5. Presidential disaster declaration approved, federal help on the way to New Mexicans  KOAT New Mexico
description: Wildfires and straight-line winds that have ravaged New Mexico for a month have created a major disaster, President Joe Biden declared, unlocking critical federal aid as the state continues to battle the largest wildfire burning in the United States.
